name: Requiem at Thaw
description:
"Story":

The world was left damaged by the sentinel gods, lands disrupted and societies fell apart. Now humanity is trying to find a way to fix the damage done and one day a Pathfinder found some places that might be the answer.

Your task is to investigate more in depth and become as strong as you can.

Note: This game was made for the 2020 Unreal Spring Jam, may contain bugs and unfinished gameplay.

Keyboard Controls:

  • Use mouse to look around
  • Left Mouse Button - Swing Axe
  • W/A/S/D - Player Movement
  • Spacebar - Jump
  • Left Shift - Dash Forward
  • Escape - Pause

Gamepad Controls (XBox):

  • RightThumstick To look around
  • Right Trigger - Swing Axe
  • Left Thumbstick - Player Movement
  • A - Jump
  • Left Trigger - Dash Forward
  • Start - Pause

Gameplay Instructions:

  • Mine rocks for clue progress and crystal currency
  • Find all clues for the Symbol Sequence
  • Hit shrines in the correct order to open the exit
  • Avoid being hit by crystal creatures
